thread.title: Pharrell Williams in Chanel Suit at - Pharrell Williams Academy Awards Red Carpet 2017
thread.title_full: Pharrell Williams in Chanel Suit at Oscars 2017 - Pharrell Williams Academy Awards Red Carpet 2017

author: Lauren Alexis Fisher
title: Pharrell Williams in Chanel Suit at - Pharrell Williams Academy Awards Red Carpet 2017

organizations.name: pharrell williams academy awards red carpet

text: Pharrell Williams, Chanel ambassador and all-around king of looking dapper, showed up at the Oscars tonight dressed like none other than Karl Lagerfeld. In an outfit that looks like it could've been taken directly from the designer's closet, Pharrell wore a black suit, bow tie, diamond brooch and multiple layers of black pearl necklaces. The singer, who's a muse to Lagerfeld and front row regular at Chanel's shows, certainly did the fashion house proud tonight.
